dict.string: Today is 11 days, which are one week and four days, of the Omer.
Hoy es once días, que son una semana y cuatro días del Omer.
Aujourd'hui est onze jours, qui sont une semaine et quatre jours du Omer
СЕГОДНЯ ОДИННАДЦАТЬ ДНЕЙ - ЧТО СОСТАВЛЯЕТ ОДНУ НЕДЕЛЮ И ЧЕТЫРЕ ДНЯ - ОМЕРА.

How to Focus and Manage Time
Learn how to focus and manage time in this short life-advice video from Rabbi Simon Jacobson, author of the best-seller "Toward a Meaningful Life."
https://youtu.be/w310u9gl81I
Extend the plan you made on day two for a longer period of time, listing short-term and long-term goals. Review and update it each day, and see how consistent you are and if you follow through.
Is my discipline consistent or only when forced?
Effective discipline must be enduring and tenacious.
Do I follow through with discipline?
Am I perceived as a weak disciplinarian?
